about_the_game:
★★★ Idol engage in H training to sleep with the producer!?


The girl you are going to meet is a new idol who is concerned about her virginity.
Player is a man who takes a liking to her and secretly supports her.

“I’m going to sleep with producer, so please help me with Lost Virgin!”
After receiving such an unexpected request, We actually ended up at a love hotel.

Being able to have your first H experience with a girl you like, especially an idol, is like a dream come true situation.
Although the circumstances are unique, but if both parties agree, there shouldn't be any problems...
The one is a close friend, so let's consider it as helping them out!

―― Thus, the doki-doki first experience with a friend idol is turned into a multi-ending simulation game with Live2D animation.

Have sex for the first time with a virgin idol... Experience the sense of superiority and realism.

★A simulation game where you have sex with your best friend idol girl for the first time.


The rules are simple.
During the time limit, you can do whatever you want with your friend, the idol heroine.

Whether you want to focus on a particular area, use any items, or have her do something to you, it's all good.
As part of the H training, she will accept anything.
It's all up to you how you want to play.

★A best friend and idol girl writhing in Live2D animation!


The heroine's reaction to your actions is expressed in Live2D animation with a sense of realism and immersion.

Kissing, ear licking, blowjob, breast massage, fingering, cunnilingus, electric massager, vibrator, face slapping, breast slapping, Stomach punch, electric current...
A variety of plays in the name of H training!
Of course you can get into her deeply!

Let's accompany the heroine's practice as our desires lead us!

★ Time scale adjustable!!!


High-quality H motions can be freely adjusted from 1 to 5 times speed!!
You're sure to find the intensity you prefer!!

It's also fun to combine them!!

★Fully voiced story mode included!


In addition to the tactile experience game, this work also features a fully voiced story mode.
With over 450 audios, you can relive the story with the heroine in an adventure way!

★ Unlimited H Mode Included


For players who simply want to enjoy the game without any time constraints,
the standard version includes an unlimited H mode with no time limit.

Without worrying about time or results, feel free to accompany the heroine in H practice as much as you like!

★ Branches into 10 different endings depending on the player's actions

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game where the protagonist engages in sexual activities with the girl he likes, including missionary sex, kissing, ear licking, oral sex, breast fondling, fingering, cunnilingus, vibrating massage wand, face slapping, chest slapping, belly punching, electric currents, and NTR (cuckoldry) scenarios.

short_description: Having your first H experience with the girl you like, who is even an idol, is like a dream come true. Although the situation is somewhat special, as long as both parties agree, there shouldn’t be a problem, right...? She’s a good friend, so just think of it as doing her a favor!
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
